PRIME MINISTER

Well I think itâs a question of taking an overall national interest, and in the long run the only thing Iâm interested in is the commercial advantage of Australia. Iâm not interested in ideology or theories. Iâm interested in driving the hardest possible bargain for Australians and that at the moment means that weâve got to get as many overseas markets as possible and if we lose sight of that weâll do our country a lot of damage.
